title: Nvidia Is Breaking Out on the Upside So It's Time to Get Long Now
text:
Nvidia Corp. (NVDA) is making an upside breakout now. Right now. We looked at NVDA just last week and concluded that, "The charts of NVDA look fairly positive so traders should approach the stock from the long side."

Today NVDA is moving up and over its key April highs so if you did not go long already, now is the time to pick up your mouse and get moving.

In this daily bar chart of NVDA, below, we can see that prices are up sharply today. The 50-day moving average line and the 200-day moving average line have positive slopes.

The On-Balance-Volume (OBV) line is moving above its September and April peaks for a bullish breakout and the clear message that buyers of NVDA are more aggressive.

The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) oscillator has turned up to a new outright go long signal.

In this weekly bar chart of NVDA, below, we can imagine how the chart will look at Friday's close. NVDA will probably close strong and well above the April high. The 40-week moving average line will continue to rise.

The weekly OBV line will probably make a new high for the move up and best even the 2018 high. The MACD oscillator will move further above the zero line.

In this Point and Figure chart of NVDA, below, we can see today's breakout and a projected price target of $243.

Bottom line strategy: Hold longs from last week and add to longs here and on any further strength. Risk a close below $185 for now. Target $243 or higher.
description: NVDA is moving up and over its key April highs....NVDA
authors: Nvidia Is Breaking Out On The Upside So It'S Time To Get Long Now
